attributes.action: Bigger consequences for absent fathers that take no responsibility for the child
attributes.additional_details: I think this would help the birth rate in the uk to drop,  less single parent family’s needing to apply for benefits for financial support , teenage girls not getting pregnant in the future as much or been manipulated by these men and been left to raise a child alone less parents having to help raise grandchildren later in life I think this would make men take fatherhood more seriously and use protection bigger consequences would make them make better decisions and this can help future generation
attributes.background: I think more consequences should be put in place in the uk for fathers who take no responsibility for there child if they are the natural father & have no child or violence criminal offences. Help financially provide even if just on universal credit & holding them accountable for the children too.

rejection.details:
There’s also already a petition about this issue. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one about a very similar issue.

You are more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

Make it a legal offence for a parent to be absent from their child's life.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701777
